idea-plugin.name: Data-Tool
idea-plugin.description:
Data-Tool

This plugin help you parse/pretty origin code,like Long-SQL/Mybatis SQL Log /JSON String
You can click menu 'Window'-->'Show Data Tool Window' Open the ToolWindow,and select suitable type to format the input-code,the result will show in TextArea 'Result'.
plugin Features:
  • Parse Mybatis log to SQL.
  • Format Long SQL.
  • Format JSON String.

特性:
  • 解析Mybatis日志.
  • 格式化比较长的SQL语句
  • 格式化JSON字符串
